relation: An extension to add to the filename, if not explicitly given by the user. The string should include the leading dot (ignored by the open dialog).
Sequence of (label, pattern) tuples. The same label may occur with several patterns. Use “*” as the pattern to indicate all files.
Initial file (ignored by the open dialog)
Which window to place the message box on top of. When the dialog is closed, the focus is returned to the parent window.
textBeforeTable: Table 9-4. askopenfilename options The following options can be used with the askopenfilename and asksavefilename functions: Figure 9-6. askopenfilename, asksaveasfilename tkFileDialog.asksaveasfilename([options]). tkFileDialog.askopenfilename([options]). If the dialog is cancelled by the user, the function returns None. The tkFileDialog module can be used to get a filename from the user. The module provides two convenience functions, one to get an existing filename so you can open it, and one to get a new filename, to save things into. File Dialogs
